Desc.entry: Qualifying body for professional civil engineers and civil engineering technicians. Dissemination of knowledge in the broad field of civil engineering and construction. A registered charity but has a commercial subsidiary company, Thomas Telford Limited, which is based in London.

Pubs.entry: Briefing, newsletter; annual report; combined programme

ContactName.entry: Eur-Ing D K Tattersall, Regional Director, Yorkshire and Humber

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: The office is not open to callers/visitors, even by appointment. Telephone calls, faxes and e-mails may be sent at any time.
